objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#F5F2E6'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#E8F0DD'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#D6E8C8'/><rect x='0' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#2B5830' opacity='0.9'/><rect x='540' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#7AB547' opacity='0.8'/><path d='M0,0 L1080,1080' stroke='#2B5830' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M1080,0 L0,1080' stroke='#2B5830' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='270' cy='270' r='200' fill='#7AB547' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='810' cy='810' r='200' fill='#F5F2E6' opacity='0.3'/><g transform='translate(60, 60)'><path d='M0,0 C30,10 60,5 90,0 C120,-5 150,10 180,0' stroke='#2B5830' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.4'/><path d='M0,30 C30,40 60,35 90,30 C120,25 150,40 180,30' stroke='#2B5830' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.4'/></g><g transform='translate(840, 840)'><path d='M0,0 C30,10 60,5 90,0 C120,-5 150,10 180,0' stroke='#F5F2E6' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.4'/><path d='M0,30 C30,40 60,35 90,30 C120,25 150,40 180,30' stroke='#F5F2E6' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.4'/></g><path d='M540,0 L540,1080' stroke='#8A6E3C' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M0,540 L1080,540' stroke='#8A6E3C' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.5'/></svg>

objects.text:
PIGEON PEA SEEDS
HIGH-YIELD RESEARCH VARIETY

• Research-backed high-yield variety
• Disease-resistant & climate-adaptable
• Premium quality with high germination
• Professional grade for commercial farming

product_details.name: Premium Japan-2 Pigeon Pea Seeds | High-Yield Research Variety by Khamma Khodal
product_details.description:
• Research-backed variety specifically developed for optimal yield
• Premium quality seeds with high germination rate
• Disease-resistant and climate-adaptable variety
• Uniform seed size and superior quality for consistent growth
• Professional grade agricultural seeds for commercial farming
• Scientifically tested for enhanced productivity
• Suitable for various soil conditions
• Easy-to-grow variety with excellent pod formation
• Backed by Khamma Khodal's quality assurance
• Perfect for both small-scale and commercial cultivation

banner_details:
The banner design is a promotional display for an agricultural product, featuring a clean and structured layout divided into quadrants of contrasting yet harmonious soft green hues. At the top-left, a bold text layer (`heading`) introduces the product name, supported by a second text layer (`subheading`) that details the product type and emphasis. A small text block (`tagline`) beneath highlights the brand association. On the right side, a central product image (`product_image`) showcases the seed packaging prominently. Below, the lower-left quadrant includes a feature list (`description`) outlining product benefits. The bottom-right segment emphasizes a marketing badge (`badge`), supported by a call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with text (`cta`). Background includes intersecting diagonal lines and faded circular motifs for subtle decorative depth.

**Color Palette:**
- Forest Green (`#2B5830`)
- Sage Green (`#7AB547`)
- Light Olive (`#D6E8C8`)
- Pale Mint (`#E8F0DD`)
- Warm Cream (`#F5F2E6`)
- Earthy Gold-Brown (`#8A6E3C`)
product_color: The product image uses a fresh and organic color palette that highlights agricultural richness. Dominant colors include shades of green, brown, and white, emphasizing natural ingredients and purity. The vibrant green (#4B8B3B, #7BB661) is used prominently on the borders and background, evoking freshness and sustainability. Earthy brown (#C3A980) from the pigeon peas adds a natural, organic essence. Orange (#F47C20) in the brand name adds energy and attention, forming a perfect complement to the greens. White (#FFFFFF) is used as the base, giving contrast and brightness, ensuring elements stand out. These colors blend smoothly while maintaining individual visual prominence.
